    • activate

      public boolean activate()
      Description copied from class: BasicAction
      Overloaded version of activate -- sets up the store, performs read_state followed by restore_state. The store root is null.
      Specified by:
      activate in interface ActionBeanWrapperInterface
      Overrides:
      activate in class BasicAction
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • ObjectStore
